org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.layer.unit

Interface MultiUnitServiceFusion

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlindStateOperationService, BlindStateOperationServiceCollection, BlindStateProviderService, BrightnessStateOperationService, BrightnessStateOperationServiceCollection, BrightnessStateProviderService, ColorStateOperationService, ColorStateOperationServiceCollection, ColorStateProviderService, IlluminanceStateProviderService, IlluminanceStateProviderServiceCollection, MotionStateProviderService, MotionStateProviderServiceCollection, OperationService, PowerConsumptionStateProviderService, PowerConsumptionStateProviderServiceCollection, PowerStateOperationService, PowerStateOperationServiceCollection, PowerStateProviderService, ProviderService, Service, SmokeAlarmStateProviderService, SmokeAlarmStateProviderServiceCollection, SmokeStateProviderService, SmokeStateProviderServiceCollection, StandbyStateOperationService, StandbyStateOperationServiceCollection, StandbyStateProviderService, TamperStateProviderService, TamperStateProviderServiceCollection, TargetTemperatureStateOperationService, TargetTemperatureStateOperationServiceCollection, TargetTemperatureStateProviderService, TemperatureStateProviderService, TemperatureStateProviderServiceCollection
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Location, UnitGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocationRemote, UnitGroupRemote

    public interface MultiUnitServiceFusion
extends BrightnessStateOperationServiceCollection, ColorStateOperationServiceCollection, PowerStateOperationServiceCollection, BlindStateOperationServiceCollection, StandbyStateOperationServiceCollection, TargetTemperatureStateOperationServiceCollection, MotionStateProviderServiceCollection, SmokeAlarmStateProviderServiceCollection, SmokeStateProviderServiceCollection, TemperatureStateProviderServiceCollection, PowerConsumptionStateProviderServiceCollection, TamperStateProviderServiceCollection, IlluminanceStateProviderServiceCollection
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood

      default rst.domotic.state.BlindStateType.BlindState getBlindState()
      Returns up if all shutter services are up and else the from up differing state of the first shutter.
      default rst.domotic.state.BlindStateType.BlindState getBlindState(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType)
      Returns up if all shutter services of the given unit type are up and else the from up differing state of the first shutter.

      default rst.domotic.state.MotionStateType.MotionState getMotionState()
      Computes the motion state as motion if at least one underlying services replies with motion and else no motion.
      default rst.domotic.state.MotionStateType.MotionState getMotionState(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType)
      Computes the motion state as motion if at least one underlying services with given unitType replies with motion and else no motion.
      default rst.domotic.state.PowerConsumptionStateType.PowerConsumptionState getPowerConsumptionState()
      Computes the average current and voltage and the sum of the consumption of the underlying services.
      default rst.domotic.state.PowerConsumptionStateType.PowerConsumptionState getPowerConsumptionState(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType)
      Computes the average current and voltage and the sum of the consumption of the underlying service with given unitType.
      default rst.domotic.state.PowerStateType.PowerState getPowerState()
      Returns on if at least one of the power services is on and else off.
      default rst.domotic.state.PowerStateType.PowerState getPowerState(rst.domotic.unit.UnitTemplateType.UnitTemplate.UnitType unitType)
      Returns on if at least one of the powerServices with given unitType is on and else off.
